welcome_message_body: Welcome to the Bronx, where the vibrant culture and rich history of New York City come to life. From the iconic Bronx Zoo to the beautiful Botanical Garden, we invite you to explore and indulge in all the charm this borough has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: F & J Pine Tavern
restaurants.description: F & J Pine Tavern is a italian restaurant located in Bronx.
restaurants.address: 1913 Bronxdale Ave (Btw Matthews & Muliner Ave.), Bronx, NY 10462

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and Canadian flights and is home to Air Canada and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights and is home to Frontier Airlines and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for unlimited access.
